item.title: Tools Guide
item.description: GitHub account First, you will need to create a GitHub account here. If you already have one, you can use your existing account. Sireum Logika In CIS 301, we will use a tool called Logika, which is a verifier and a proof checker for propositional, predicate, and programming logic. You will need to install the VS Code-based Sireum IVE (Integrated Verification Environment), which contains Logika. Getting Installer Script Go here to install Logika.
